home.title: Rekapu - Learn while procrastinating
home.description: Browser extension combining spaced repetition learning with website blocking. Answer questions before accessing sites. Learn effectively while maintaining focus.

docs.title: Documentation - Rekapu
docs.description: Complete guide to using Rekapu. Learn how to create questions, manage blocked sites, and optimize your learning.

installation.title: Installation - Rekapu
installation.description: Install Rekapu browser extension and get started with spaced repetition learning.
